sentence.Network_cn: 他最近承办了一次总统招待会的宴席。

entry.def: If you have done something recently or if something happened recently, it happened only a short time ago.

example.ex: The bank recently opened a branch in Germany...
example.tran: 这家银行最近在德国开设了分行。

example.ex: It is only fairly recently that historians have begun to investigate the question...
example.tran: 只是到最近历史学家才开始探究这个问题。

"the spelling was first affected, but latterly the meaning also"

Sentence.sentence: Mr Jobs, who died recently aged 56, spent his life packaging that magic into elegantly designed, easy-to-use products.
The difficult situation finally changed when Aaron moved recently.

When the Pew Research Center recently asked American parents to identify their"ideal"life arrangement,47 percent of mothers said they would prefer to work park-time and 20percent said they would prefer not to work at all.
Well, there have been a lot of robberies recently.

A man who had recently reconciled with his brother told Gold there's something that lets older people to put aside bad deeds of the past and focus a little on what we need now, especially when it's sisters and brothers
